welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kudelstaart, the charming city known for its beautiful canals and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our lovely city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Schiphol's main terminal, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serving mainly European flights, with a focus on low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Serving mainly intercontinental flights, including many long-haul destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Serving mainly SkyTeam alliance airlines, with a focus on connecting flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Serving mainly non-SkyTeam alliance airlines, with a focus on budget carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with unlimited usage and no time restrictions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport is used for shipping and receiving freight.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
